body: Laracasts is insane!
name: Taylor Otwell

body: Really, Laracasts is totally off the hook. Jeffrey Way is an amazing teacher.
name: Ian Landsman

body: Probably the most "must-watch" web development screencasts on the internet.
name: Dries Vints

body: Laracasts is the premier learning tool for Laravel. The tutorials are always concise and relevant. If you use Laravel, subscribing is a must!
name: Eric Barnes

body: Even when developing something I "know," I review Laracasts on the topic. There's always something new Jeff talks about, even if it's just a different point of view.
name: Chris Fidao

body: You get a window into a seasoned developer's mind and workflow for the price of an Uber. I can't overstate the value of a Laracasts subscription.
name: Caleb Porzio

body: Laracasts was the missing piece in learning Laravel. Yeah there were some series on other websites, but none of them was at this level.
name: Ionut Tanasa

body: Jeffrey is simply a one-of-a-kind tutor - teaching is obviously his calling. Laravel and Laracasts, twice as nice!!
name: Tolu Olowu

body: The next level for learning Laravel!
name: Alejandro Sanabria

body: I'll admit, I've struggled with understanding the framework. Thanks to Jeffrey at Laracasts, I'm converting my current projects into Laravel with absolute ease.
name: Joe Dawson

body: Great resource by Jeffrey Way to take my knowledge of Laravel to the limits!
name: Sam Jordan

body: Not only will you become better at developing with this amazing framework, Jeffrey will teach you to become a better developer all round. He is, in my opinion, one of the best and most encouraging teachers out there.
name: Michael Watts

body: It doesn't matter if you're a beginner or an expert, there's something for everyone here. It not only makes a great learning tool, but it is an amazing resource of information!
name: Brian Gallagher

body: Laracasts offer a phenomenal way to learn the Laravel framework. Highly recommended!
name: Michael Deol

body: Laracasts is a fountain that keeps giving. Jeffery rocks!
name: Tambi Jalouqa

body: Laracasts is taking my software development skills to the next level! Welcome to the new era of learning.
name: Pablo Acuña

body: Laracasts has become my first stop for Laravel training awesomeness.
name: Kelby Garside

body: I just scratched the surface of Laravel watching Jeffrey Way's tutorials. By far the best tutor there is!
name: Toni Perić

body: Absolutely love the site. Jeffrey is one of the best screencasters out there. Subscription is a no-brainer!
name: Duncan Heal

body: I've been a Laracasts member for a while. Jeffrey showed me that it's okay to not understand everything at once. Programming can be hard but with enough patience and determination you can become a good programmer. He's a great teacher and human being. I love Laracast's Snippet podcast.
name: Selene Arzola

body: Laracasts has been helpful in leveling up my skill-set - not only in Laravel and PHP, but as a developer in general.
name: Kofi Cypher

body: My lifetime Laracasts membership has been one of the most immediately useful and continually valuable tools in my developer toolkit. From jumping into a new IDE, or reinforcing best practices, it's one of the first references I turn to.
name: Sherri W.

body: Laracasts puts a real-time perspective on building Laravel applications and offers a chance to pair-program with a real expert.
name: Toby Steward

body: Jeffrey Way is the best guide in the Laravel world! Thank you for Laracasts.
name: Radoslaw Kosinski

body: Laracasts is just awesome - the perfect place to learn the best framework in the world! I love it!
name: Robin Malfait

body: I'm not primarily a PHP developer anymore, but I'd be one of the first to recommend Laracasts. Hell, I still watch videos now to keep up to date with the latest Vue, PHP and laravel "feature"s. One of the best investments of my career.
name: Amanda Rose

body: I've dug into half of the Laravel framework, and have had pull requests accepted into the framework. I consider myself to be an expert in Laravel, and I learn something from nearly every Laracasts video.
name: J.T. Grimes

body: For the"show-and-tell" learner, there's no better, more affordable way to get up to speed with Laravel, dev tools, or coding best practices than Laracasts.
name: Garrett St. John

body: Dedicating short amounts of time more often, rather than several hours at once, is a great way to learn without feeling overwhelmed. Jeffrey Way is able to break complex topics into interesting bite-sized pieces that are fun to digest!
name: OrphanedRecord

body: As a web designer trying to evolve into a developer, I was blown away at how clearly Jeffrey presents concepts while providing a nice challenge curve. Signing up for a paid account was a no brainer.
name: Mary-Ann Zykin

body: Simply put, Laracasts has expanded my knowledge of development by steering me in the right direction to learn more on my own in addition to learning from the screencasts.
name: Matthew Robitaille

body: Laracasts is hands down the best resource available for picking up Laravel from scratch, as well as catching tips and tricks you might have otherwise missed.
name: Lee Nugent

body: Jeffrey is simply the teacher I never had.
name: Rafael Antonio

body: Utterly addictive and enjoyable. I think I might have my first ever man-crush.
name: Darren Benney

body: Laracasts is the definitive resource for learning Laravel. Period.
name: Mike Rogne

body: Probably, the best mentor I'll never meet!
name: Mark Campbell

body: What better way to learn Laravel than to watch one of the best in the field hold your hands and teach you to see the beauty in the framework.
name: Dayo Akinkuowo

body: Laracasts has not only improved my understanding of Laravel as a framework, but the language, constructs, and best practices of PHP development. Highly recommended!
name: Todd Smith-Salter

body: I'm learning something new at Laracasts every day! It's a phenomenal way to incrementally grow your development strategy!
name: Adam Engebretson

body: The one thing I really appreciate about Laracasts is that Jeffrey has content for developers of all knowledge levels. From setting up Laravel for the first time to going deep into the Laravel IOC, to Laravel testing and deployment, Laracasts has it all.
name: Jake Chapman

body: Laracasts has been an absolutely amazing resource in learning Laravel, as well as learning more solid coding practices in general. Jeffrey has a unique ability to clearly and concisely break down complicated topics so anyone can grasp them and apply them in their own projects.
name: Jeff Claeson

body: Love Laracasts! It lets me explore areas of Laravel outside of my comfort zone. Not only that, Jeffrey likes to try loads of different methods to getting to the same result which helps understand why you end up where you are. Plus he's great at explaining pretty complex functionality!
name: Chris Southam

body: I can't stop refreshing!
name: Bastian Hofmann

body: Laracasts has dramatically helped level up my PHP code. Jeffrey Way knows exactly how to break down advanced topics so they are not overwhelming, but actually enjoyable to learn!
name: Mark Hanson

body: Jeffrey was born to be a teacher! Every topic gets covered in great detail, and it's a pleasure to learn from somebody who loves what he does!
name: Jovan Haji-Djurich

body: I watch a Laracast a day to discover new things!
name: Kbir Mhrjn

body: Laracasts has made me a better developer.
name: Donald Allen

body: Laracasts provide invaluable insight into "feature"s of Laravel that might not be in my comfort zone. In addition, his incremental style of teaching is a great aid in understanding complex framework-agnostic topics and design patterns.
name: Sean Mumford

body: Jeffrey is a great developer and teacher. Laracasts, without a doubt, is an amazing resource to become a better developer.
name: Udi Mosayev

body: I came to Laracasts knowing almost nothing about Laravel. After a month, I had made a full blogging system, learnt more about configuring tools to help me develop on my Mac, and I'm now working on a full "feature"d site using what I've learnt.
name: Ben Sampson

body: I have been a member since day one, and it's the best tool, not only for Laravel, but for so much more. Jeffrey is one of the best tutors online.
name: George Rome

body: Laracasts renewed my excitement in PHP. It's rare to find such a great community that is committed to teaching, sharing and socialising.
name: Jacob Marshall

body: This is just awesome; I keep checking the website for new updates every day!
name: Tally Schmeits

body: Of all the ways to learn Laravel, this is by far the best. From beginner to pro, you will pick up a ton.
name: Dustin Fraker

body: I just spent the last week of my three-week vacation in Thailand watching Laracasts. It's that good.
name: Eskil Kvalnes

body: Laracast's has taught me so much, giving me the right stepping stones to climb higher to becoming a better developer.
name: Shea Lewis

body: Laracasts is, without a doubt, the single greatest resource for PHP developers. I have, and will continue to recommend Laracasts to anyone who even mutters the letters PHP.
name: Chris Gooding

body: Learning Laravel from scratch is easy with Laracasts. The best way to learn something new is to just watch Jeffrey explain it in his own words.
name: Saša

body: I said it a year ago and I'll say it again: Jeffrey is simply the teacher I never had.
name: Rafael Antonio

body: Laracasts is awesome and all – but it's the man behind it that makes all the difference. If Jeff decides to start a tutorial site about knitting, I'll be the first to subscribe.
name: Jehad Assaf

body: The best subscription for a developer ever! Not just for Laravel development, Jeffrey covers programming principles, improving efficiency and workflows, making development enjoyable.
name: Ashwin Sureshkumar

body: Even if you're already well-versed in the subject matter, the amount of ancillary knowledge you'll gain about tools, workflows, and best practices is worth the subscription in itself.
name: Tom Schlick

body: Jeffrey has been teaching and inspiring me for at least 7 years now. He is one of the main reasons I chose Laravel and Vue. He has an incredibly effective method of teaching and explains complex concepts in a concise and easily accessible way. It's not an exaggeration to say I wouldn't be where I am without him.
name: Jess Archer

body: As a self-employed nerd working from my home office, it's a challenge to keep myself motivated to keep learning and evolving. With my subscription to Laracasts, I have gained a tremendous amount of knowledge in a, for me, very fun and time affordable easy way. Jeffrey is an exceptional teacher.
name: Mark Putten

body: Laracasts tutorials are addictive! It's like an infinite well of knowledge. Whenever you think you know your stuff, Jeffrey posts another video that blows your mind!
name: Ivan Vermeyen

body: Jeffrey Way is an excellent teacher. PHP developers at any level will benefit from Laracasts. Simply the best!
name: Nathan Morgan

body: Being out of the PHP scene for a while, Laracasts has helped me hit the ground running with a good mix of high level theory, every day trench work, and best practices.
name: John Turknett

body: My best ever investment in education has been Laracasts. It's a million times better than college. Jeff, you are a Jedi knight!
name: Vishnu Padmanabhan

body: Laracasts taught me more in a month than I've learnt at university in two years. Absolutely indispensable.
name: Robb Lewis

body: Absolutely fantastic resource for not only Laravel, but PHP principles as well. Will gladly continue to buy Jeffrey two cups of coffee a month to learn from Laracasts!
name: Jason McCallister

body: I spend most days checking with Laracasts. I love it, can't get enough of it, and every day I learn something new.
name: Lee Stables

body: Every day, I check Laracasts for some new really good tutorials about Laravel! Best site ever!
name: Simon

body: I've been using Laracast as my main Laravel learning resource ever since it went live. I believe it has the best Laravel teaching material out there. Also, the forum is really active, and you will find a solution/answer for any of your questions.
name: Adib Hanna

body: Wow, Jeffrey: you and Laracasts are amazing!! I appreciate all the time and effort you put into this site.
name: Uziel Bueno

body: Laracasts is amazing! I have learned so much from Jeffrey in the last 12 months. It has given me a much broader knowledge of PHP and software architecture. Money well spent!
name: Sean Tymon

body: Laracasts is just perfect! It has helped me understand a lot of aspects of PHP and app architecture. I enjoy every single Laracasts lesson.
name: Alex

body: Laracasts is an incredible value. If you're new to the Laravel community, it's the perfect place to start!
name: Trevor Gehman

body: If you're new to modern PHP development, Laracasts is a no-brainer. When I landed my first API project, Laracasts quickly gave me the tools I needed to understand Laravel and build a solid app. There's nothing else like it!
name: G. M. Henderson

body: For beginners to the experienced, Laracasts helps you improve your coding skills and technique. The content and community is friendly, approachable and makes learning fun.
name: Greg Robson

body: Thanks a lot for your brilliant form of explaining complex and difficult concepts!
name: Rene Bartkowiak

body: Trying to figure out how and when to use repositories was giving me headaches. Laracasts made it so simple. I was able to not just understand them, but put them into practice in my own project the same day.
name: Brian Rogers

body: Jeffrey is making my dream of making a job out of my passion for web development a reality!
name: John Rivs

body: Laracasts is an excellent learning platform - and not just for beginners. And with Jeff's amazing teaching skills, you can rest assured that you're in good hands.
name: Terry Harvey

body: After using Laravel for some time and seeing Laracasts, I knew that PHP and Laravel could be fun to learn - especially when it is being delivered by one of my mentors: Jeffrey Way.
name: Mfawa Alfred Onen

body: Laracasts is more American than apple pie! Jeff is the best instructor I've ever had the pleasure of listening to.
name: Geoff Selby

body: Laracasts changed the way I code. I look at web development in a totally new way now, and it's all thanks to Jeffrey's content and community contributions.
name: Richard Bagshaw

body: Laracasts is a great replacement for looking over the shoulders of a senior developer. As a freelancer, I get tremendous value from each lesson.
name: Gunther Groenewege

body: If Jeffrey taught macramé, I'd want to pay him $9 a month to learn it. Thank goodness he teaches Laravel.
name: Paul Spiteri

body: If you want to learn to code, give Jeffrey Way your time and energy. From beginner to advanced lessons, his style is pertinent, informative, and invaluable.
name: Tyler Walker

body: I bought a Laracasts subscription hoping to understand Laravel better. Not only has it done that, but it's made me a better developer in all aspects of PHP.
name: Matt Brunt

body: Laracasts is the best resource for any PHP Developer, and Jeffrey Way is the best teacher! A proud Laracasts subscriber for life.
name: Gerhard Botha

body: Before I write any code, I ask myself "What would Jeffrey do?" Odds are, he's covered it in depth on Laracasts!
name: Andre Madarang

body: Laracasts has made me a better developer in not only Laravel/PHP, but in programming in general. With every screencast, I've learned something new. I highly recommend it!
name: Chris Bogardo

body: While I don't code in PHP for my current job, I always check out Laracasts for the tools and patterns that I can apply in the different languages I work in. Worth every penny!
name: Eric Peterson

body: Laracasts has made me a better developer. Not just a Laravel developer, but a better developer on the whole.
name: Anurag

body: I'm not just a new Laravel user, I'm a new web developer in general. Let me tell you, I wouldn't be coding anything now if it weren't for Jeffrey's excellent teaching.
name: Stephen Finney

body: Laracasts is THE learning resource for Laravel. I can't count how many times Jeffrey has introduced me to new concepts and little tricks that save me dozens of hours over the course of the year. If you're thinking about signing up, just do it!
name: Rui Gomes

body: If Heisenberg cooked screencasts, this would be his cookbook.
name: Kyle Ferguson

body: A Laracast a day keeps the bad practices away.
name: Freek

body: Laracasts has been the best resource I've ever invested money into, and it's worth every single penny!
name: James King

body: Jeffery Way IS that ternary machine that can run any algorithm. You learn to just except his infinite awesomeness, because it just hurts your head to think about it too much!
name: Dustin Woodard

body: I've always preferred learning programming languages with online courses and videos. Well, let me tell you: from all videos I've seen, to all the University classes I've taken, I've never seen a better instructor than Jeffrey. You actually get attached to his screencasts like you would to a TV Show!
name: Nicolás Múnera

body: All the knowledge that Jeffrey shares with us is simply invaluable!
name: Sahib Alejandro

body: Learning has never been this fun. Jeffrey is by far the best teacher I've ever had. He makes learning Laravel as easy as ABC.
name: Damilola Ogunmoye

body: Excellent video, excellent examples... I've nothing to say except very well done Jeff. You're amazing. I never regret my monthly subscription.
name: Caporal Dead

body: Jeffrey's ten minutes of pedagogic instructions has taken me to the next level in web development. It's an amazing site packed with aha moments.
name: Rocky Montana

body: Laracasts is a great place to hang out and learn from one of the best programming teachers to ever teach Laravel and PHP.
name: Olawale Adewoyin

body: Loving the content so far; Jeffrey and his tutorials are one of the reasons I can code like this today (since CodeIgniter times). I'm glad I subscribed to Laracasts.
name: Arda

body: The best resource to learn Laravel! Jeffrey did an amazing job. This was exactly what was missing for the community.
name: Ricardo Fuhrmann

body: Having something like Laracasts was the missing piece in the laravel ecosystem. I've been following Jeffrey for a long time! All I say is if you want to really master the framework, forget about the $9 and just get started.
name: Bhargav Anand

body: Been following Jeffrey's work from Nettuts+ to Laracasts, and there is no visual teacher as concise and knowledgeable as him.
name: Brenley Dueck

body: Learning anything should be always like this - a pleasure. Thank you for helping me through the learning process of such a great framework.
name: Miguel Durão

body: As an experienced Laravel developer, I have my ways of doing things. With Laracasts, and the great way that Jeffrey teaches, I learn that my way is not always the best way. The subscription paid for itself after the first video I watched!
name: Bretterer

body: I am the original owner of Laracasts.com domain and my purpose for it was to make #1 learning resource for Laravel community. While I have not found the time to do make it by myself, I knew that Jeffrey would exceed all of my expectations and that's exactly what happened. Love the content!
name: Maksim Surguy
